website_summaries.verdict: A casual shoe like the Ecco Soft 7 Cleat did not disappoint the buyers when it comes to comfort and style. It is also one of the bang-for-your-buck shoes because it is not only durable, but it also offers excellent fit and support, even for those who have flat feet.But some users who were not happy about the sizing and squeakiness of this shoe. Nevertheless, if you are on the lookout for a high-top sneaker that you can wear while traveling, working, or just walking around, the Ecco Soft 7 Cleat is a good choice.
pros: Majority of those who own a pair of Ecco Soft 7 Cleat complimented the shoe for being incredibly comfortable
The stylish and versatile design of this shoe is lauded by most users
Many wearers gave positive remarks regarding the soft, buttery leather
This Ecco Soft shoe provides a great fit, almost like it’s custom-made, according to a lot of reviews
The quality of the Ecco Soft 7 Cleat is good, based on numerous reviews
A good number of buyers mentioned that this shoe is worth its price tag
This Ecco Soft sneaker can be worn with almost anything, said several reviewers
A few flat-footed individuals appreciated the removable insole because they can use their orthotics when wearing the shoe
A handful of people felt that this shoe is lightweight
The Soft 7 Cleat by Ecco offers great support, as stated by a couple of commenters
One happy consumer commended the rich color of this shoe
cons: Most wearers complained that the Ecco Soft 7 Cleat runs big
The white midsole gets stained easily, according to several disgruntled users
Some found it hard to put the shoe on and off
A couple of users noted that this shoe is squeaky on almost all kinds of surface

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, waterproof, lightweight lace up boot with very good arch support - I purchased them as a casual wintertime boot for RI winter. These boots lived up to all of my expectations. I am a longtime (20+yrs) customer of the Ecco brand!
customer_reviews.author: Badeye

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be well made. Can't write a complete review until after I wear them for a few weeks. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: Barry T

customer_reviews.title: It is good for all seasons
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof with core due , naterall leather . It is good for all seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Sergey Marychev Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box the typical ecco quality was not there. Immediately sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Kosloske

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, good for rainy weather
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, great water resistance, nice modern style. They're a bit hot to wear in warmer weather due to the Goretex sealing everything up, but where I currently live half the year is cold so this is welcome. Yes it's worth the investment. I've worn it pretty much every day for 8+ months and it shows very little wear with no tears or sole coming off or anything like that. Solid quality.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: This is a winner. Leather is soft and doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a winner. Leather is soft and doesn't stress the ankle. Has waterproofing protection in between laces and tongue that you can wade in water almost ankle deep. Protects you both from water and cold and Goretex is a plus...
customer_reviews.author: Genwin

customer_reviews.title: Lifeless
customer_reviews.text: These sneaker don't have character in my opinion. It's as exciting as wearing a pair of plastic rain boots.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were exactly as I had hoped they would be. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Bart V Nikolas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, light and waterproof. A really good winter boot that isn't clunky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Always wear Ecco, paid a lot for theses shoes. Way too small!!!
customer_reviews.author: batrant

customer_reviews.title: It looks like a dress shoe/tennis shoe
customer_reviews.text: It looks like a dress shoe/tennis shoe. Putting them on for me is tight because of a fused ankle but other than than I’m satisfied
customer_reviews.author: James Leen

product_meta.title: ECCO Men's Soft 7 Classic Boots
product_meta.description: Embracing Ecco’s core values, the Soft 7 sneaker is a celebration of Scandinavian design with an understated, contemporary twist
feature_bullets: Gore-tex waterproof construction ensures dry and comfortable feet in wet weather conditions
Removable leather-covered inlay sole with ecco comfort fibre system helps to keep footwear fresh and dry
Direct-injected two-component pu/tpu outsole - a highly comfortable, hard-wearing, light and flexible sole
A full anatomical last shape provides a supremely comfortable fit
